transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Digitally electronics mein baat ho rahi hai sir meri?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir main Reena baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART head office se Durgesh ke senior manager.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Sir abhi Durgesh se aapki call pe discussion hui thi regarding the services and after the call aapke paas ek feedback mail aaya tha.
Customer: Uss pe aapne not satisfied whatsapp pe aaya tha.
Executive: Feedback feedback mail nahi hai main do lead purchase kiya tha theek hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aur ye Durgesh samay mein do lead bol raha hai ki lead nahi aa raha hai nahi after lead nahi aa raha hai to isliye dekh ke dekh ke main do lead purchase kiya tha.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: To uske andar ek lead pura hi galat hai bol raha hai nahi mera koi requirement nahi hai aisa lead bahut sara aate hain.
Executive: Nahi nahi main batati hoon usme kya hota hai sir ek cheez dekho by lead ke scenario mein kya hota hai ki koi by lead agar IndiaMART pe post hoti hai to usko paanch supplier consume kar sakte hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai ab post hoti hai to waha pe aap ye cheeze dekh lo ki customer ka kya kya detail updated hai bio detail mein usne mobile number email address business address sari cheeze verified hai ya nahi hai aur kitni wo recent ki by lead hai sometime ye hota hai na ki kuch customers se man lijiye aap as a third supplier ban ke call karoge already wo buyer jo hai do logo se baat chit kar leta hai na to wo kahin na kahin call ko avoid karne ke liye discussion ko avoid karne ke liye ye cheeze keh deta hai ki meri abhi koi requirement nahi hai as of now ya ho sakta hai ki kisi customer ki requirement do month ke baad hogi usko just for the information prices ka information ho gaya market mein product kya product ka price other competitor ka kya chal raha hai aapke to wo iske liye bhi information post kar dete hain as a by lead ya inquiry IndiaMART pe ki agar unko ye pata hai ki agar jab tak wo phone number nahi dalenge unki by lead generate nahi hogi IndiaMART pe inquiry post nahi ho payegi.
Executive: To do mahine baad bhi requirement hai to bhi kahin na kahin wo by lead ko post kar dete hain just for the information fake by lead koi bhi nahi hoti hai sir customer ko chahiye hota hai aaj nahi to kal to isliye wo post karte hain aur already agar do teen logo se discussion ho gaya.
Customer: Actual jo hota hai main dekha tha ki koi google pe search kar raha hai ki mera ye requirement hai dekh raha hai wo bhi usko lead bol ke aap log bana dete hain.
Executive: Nahi wo inquiries mein aata hai sir main batati hoon wo direct inquiry mein isliye aa jayega kyunki for example man lo abhi maine koi product search kiya aapka hi maine product man lo utha liya MDF craft theek hai maine decorative item search kiya aur mujhe aapki company dikh gayi waha pe mujhe dikh gaya digital electronics main aapke catalog ko open karungi main ek minute se zyada agar aapke catalog ko view karti hoon to wo aapke as a inquiry generate ho jati hai so kya hamara motive ye hota hai.
Customer: Mera profile bhi hai wo to mera profile mein aa gaya lekin main bol raha hoon ki jaha pe by lead purchase kar raha hoon.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Waha pe kyun dikhayega waha pe to sahi lead hona chahiye na.
Executive: Main wahi bata rahi hoon sir nahi nahi main wahi bata rahi hoon ki customer agar kisi bhi ek supplier ka profile ek minute se zyada view karta hai to wo lead mein isliye generate ho jata hai ki hame ye lagta hai ki customer might be interested for your product sir ho sakta hai wo aapke product ke liye regarding kuch search kar raha hai aur wo ek minute se zyada agar catalog ko view kar raha hai that means ki uski requirement hai isliye aap tak hum zyada se zyada inquiry pahuncha sake isliye wo by lead ya inquiry ke terms mein generate hoti hai sir.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan aur koi motive nahi hota hai customer agar aapka jaise main hoon maine aapka product search kar liya aur mujhe aapki company dikh gayi ya kisi export agent supplier ki company dikh gayi decorative items mein maine catalog khola sari cheeze main information dekhungi na mere naam se inquiry aapke paas aa jayega generate ho jayega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aur mera number aapko dikh jayega ki main aapke catalog ko dekh rahi thi wo by lead ya inquiry ban jayega fir aapke paas.
Customer: Achcha aur ek main sir ke sath baat kiya tha to bahut sara contact number deke poster wo block ho raha hai sir ab wo dheere dheere sab cheez block nahi bhi.
Executive: Main teen saal se dekh raha hoon aapka kitna chahiye boliye main aapko thousand ka picture aapko bhej deta hoon.
Customer: Main batati hoon main batati hoon wo block nahi bhi hoga na to uski koi visibility customer ko nahi mil payegi wo google ke algorithm hi hai.
Customer: Visibility visibility nahi mil raha hai to main kahan se mil raha hai main to google se search karke hi to aapko dikha raha hoon.
Executive: Nahi nahi main aapko ye bata rahi hoon ki hum jo hai na koi bhi new image ab wo dheere dheere maximum products mein aap dekhna ki koi bhi service agar aap nayi service lete ho IndiaMART pe na to jaha pe aapne aapke product mein agar man lijiye contact number added hai koi aapne branding label lagwa rakha hai product ke pictures pe to wo aapka yaha pe block ho jata hai wo hum yaha pe add nahi karte hamari production team add hi nahi karti hai kyunki usme kya hai na visibility milna aur aapke aapke paas product ki inquiry aana yaha pe bahut difference hota hai visibility to mil jayegi lekin ek jo achi genuine relevant inquiries honi chahiye wo product image ki wajah se bhi na aapke paas nahi pahunch paati hai sir.
Executive: Jab hamari team by lead ya inquiry distribute karti hai ya jab hamare customer direct contact karte hain to waha pe jis tarike se aapki visibility ko boost up milna chahiye wo nahi mil pata aapke product image ki wajah se bhi.
Customer: Aur jo aap dekhiye aur kya hai sun acrylic bol ke ek company hai uska jitna sara product hai sun acrylic acrylic sun acrylic mein aisa kuch hai.
Executive: Haan wo bahut sara product mein hai.
Customer: Main product mein hai.
Executive: Aap hi ke product mein deal karta hai.
Customer: Main token ka upar deal karte hain MDF ka upar deal karte hain leather ka upar bahut sara item ka upar karte hain lekin pehle to bahut sara item tha lead nahi milna hai isliye main to dekhiye mera profile dekhiye to dekh payega ki mera kitna lead mera wastage mein chal jate hain kyunki main.
Executive: Inquiry aa rahi hai sir by lead aa rahi hai but kuch by lead aapke purchase karne se pehle hi sold out ho ja rahi hai to is scenario mein aap ye karo.
Customer: Main purchase karna chhod diya kyunki achcha achcha lead nahi mil raha hai isliye main profile se bahut sara picture bhi delete kar diya to uske baad naya jo account manager aaya tha wo bol raha hai ki aapko picture add kijiye main aapko dekhta hoon aapka kyun call nahi aa raha hai wo IndiaMART ka yahi tarika hai teen saal se main yahi ek cheez dekh raha hoon payment ka time mein call aane laga account manager bahut active ho jate hain bahut sara call aane laga.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa bilkul nahi hai aisa.
Customer: Are aisa hi ho raha hai main pura pura follow up kiya tha first time se jab basic plan mein tha 2800 plan tha usi time se main dekha.
Executive: Sir aap mujhe batao na abhi abhi to sir aapko service ke liye call kiya ja raha hai na abhi jo bhi pro and cons hai to wo aapse discussion kar rahe hain aisa to nahi hai ki abhi man lijiye aapka renewal hai ya fir aapko hum koi naya service aapko suggest kar rahe hain right now we are discussing over the current services right to waha pe jo bhi pro and cons hai sir aisa nahi hai ki uske regarding aap Durgesh aapka account manager hai aap usko call karoge to wo aapko kahin na kahin resolution nahi dega aisa kuch bhi nahi hai aap thoda sa dekho ab aap service chhod doge use karna to wo koi resolution nahi hai sir usse aapka solution nahi milne wala service chhod dena rahi baat by lead ki.
Customer: Mera dekhiye main to pehle jab liya tha mujhe ko bola ki itna call aayega itna call aayega abhi.
Executive: Call kaise aata hai main aapko batati hoon sir by lead ka consumption thoda zyada karna padega abhi jaise kya hai na ki aapne bahut se product aise hai jiske by lead bhi aap zyada purchase nahi kar rahe ho abhi agar main baat karu aapka ye plastic ye wooden craft abhi wooden craft cut outs mein.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan wooden craft ka upar kam zyada karte hain.
Executive: Wooden craft cut outs jo hai na wo aapke catalog mein add nahi hai ye product main add kar do sir.
Customer: Haan add add to hai to.
Executive: Nahi as a keyword aapne add nahi kiya hai isko.
Customer: Christmas item main ek account manager ka bol dijiye main kal kam se kam kal chutti nahi to.
Executive: Kal chutti hai sir main ek kaam karti hoon parso main Durgesh ko bol deti hoon.
Customer: Haan haan haan bol dijiye aur main christmas ka upar ha christmas ka upar main kam se kam 15 se 20 main catalog add kar deta hoon.
Executive: Haan aur us pe aapka product hum add bhi kar lenge wooden craft aap video meet pe bhi aa jana by lead ka bhi proper discuss kar lenge theek hai abhi jo aapne ek not satisfied mark kar diya tha na whatsapp pe aapke paas feedback aa gaya tha.
Customer: Not satisfied nahi kiya tha main whatsapp message aaya tha mera paas wo not satisfied ho gaya.
Executive: Wo galti se ho gaya hoga.
Customer: Ek minute IndiaMART IndiaMART ka gaya IndiaMART hmm wo by mistaken ho gaya hoga sir koi baat nahi ek kaam karti hoon.
Executive: Nahi nahi main wo dekhiye yaha pe option aaya tha ki achcha achcha achcha yaha pe likha hai aapka Dinesh Kumar achcha interaction how was your interaction with your haan to waha pe aapne ye jo feedback diya hai na wo feedback aapne basically aisa nahi ki aapne IndiaMART ke liye diya hai theek hai aapki service mein issue tha wo cheeze samajh mein aa rahi hai but ye particular jo feedback ke liye tha na wo aapke account manager ke liye tha ki unhone aapse aapko jo resolution diya wo aapko samajh mein aaya nahi nahi aaya ye feedback aapne unke liye diya hai sir.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha achcha haan to main ek kaam karti hoon isko main close karti hoon dobara se aapke paas ek feedback ka mail jayega sir wo mere aur Durgesh ke regarding hoga theek hai us pe aap satisfied mark kar dena aur parso ek video meet hum arrange karte hain so that we can add your all the products jisme aap maximum by lead consume kar rahe ho theek hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur uske baad by lead ke upar bhi ek baar hum discuss kar lenge theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai thank you so much for giving your time sir thank you.
Customer: Okay thank you.

Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says leads are of poor quality.

- Customer says account managers are only active during payment.

- Customer says contact numbers are blocked.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how leads are generated.

- Executive explained visibility issues with branding labels.

- Executive offered to add wooden craft cutouts to catalog.

- Executive will arrange a video meet to discuss buyleads.

- Executive will send a new feedback mail.



Next Steps: 

- Video meet to be arranged.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, visibility, account manager
